# DocSend to PDF

> Convert DocSend documents to downloadable PDF files.

DocSend2PDF is a free online tool that converts DocSend presentations and documents into PDF files. It works by loading each page of a DocSend document in a headless browser, capturing the page images, and assembling them into a single PDF.

## Features

- Convert any public DocSend link to PDF
- Supports email-gated documents (provide your email)
- Supports passcode-protected documents
- No data stored â€” PDFs are generated on-the-fly and deleted after download
- MCP Server available for AI assistants (Claude, Cursor, Copilot, etc.)

## How to Use

1. Paste a DocSend URL (e.g. https://docsend.com/view/abc123)
2. Optionally enter email and passcode if the document requires them
3. Click "Convert to PDF"
4. Download the generated PDF

## MCP Server

Install the MCP server to convert DocSend documents from any AI assistant:

```
npm install -g docsend-scraper-mcp
```

Add to your MCP client config:

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "docsend-scraper": {
      "command": "node",
      "args": ["docsend-scraper-mcp"]
    }
  }
}
```

## Links

- Website: https://docsend2pdf.app
- MCP Setup Guide: https://docsend2pdf.app/mcp
